## walk() function

Return all files matching the given pattern.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function walk(root: string, filePattern: RegExp | string): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  root | <code>string</code> | The root directory. |
|  filePattern | <code>RegExp &#124; string</code> | The file pattern to match files against. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string[]`
